Trinity::

She didn't look up at him.  She couldn't take her eyes away from the 
sight of her mother's remains laying on the ground in front of her.  
She just cried.  Whimpering, "I'm sorry mom."  she let the tears roll 
down her little cheeks.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      In genuine shock from the sight of the poor little girl crying 
he walks 
> over and says to Trinity "You're going to stay with me now.  I'll 
help you 
> and protect you until you're grown."
